answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.

answers.answer:
Bankless Academy contributes to the growth of the open-source software (OSS) ecosystem in several ways:

1. Partnerships with OSS Projects: Bankless Academy collaborates with other open-source projects in web3 to create its educational modules. This symbiotic relationship not only promotes these projects as they are part of the essential infrastructure of the app, but also provides a platform where users can learn about and get involved in them.

2. Hands-on Onboarding to Web3: the app serves as an educational gateway, introducing new users to decentralized technologies like Ethereum. By providing accessible, open content on how to navigate these systems, it helps users understand and adopt OSS tools and protocols and integrate them into their daily lives.

3. High focus on decentralization: the dApp educates about the principles of decentralization, empowering users to move away from centralized platforms and embrace OSS alternatives. This fosters a mindset of open participation and innovation, essential to expanding the OSS ecosystem.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer:
1. Ethereum Public Good: the dApp is an open, free educational resource that onboards users into web3, contributing to the Ethereum ecosystem by democratizing access to blockchain knowledge and empowering wider participation.

2. Interactive Learning Modules: the dApp provides a series of educational modules on topics like essential web3 concepts. These lessons are gamified and interactive, helping users learn by doing.

3. Quizzes and Certifications: each module includes knowledge checks or short quizzes, which users need to pass to demonstrate their knowledge. Upon completion, users receive NFT certificates as proof of their learning, showcasing their progress onchain, an building reputation through their Explorer profile.

4. Multi-Language Support: the platform is designed to be accessible to a global audience, offering lessons in multiple languages to lower barriers to entry for non-English speakers.

5. Open-Source and Collaborative: Bankless Academy leverages the open-source model by implementing open source tools as part of its infrastructure and by publishing its own code so that others can build upon it. Contributors can submit content suggestions to improve the content.

6. Real World Impact: professors have integrated the dApp as part o their students' curriculums, blockchain clubs use it for group learning, and digital communities are adding the dApp as a new step in their member/contributor journey.
    
Through these features, Bankless Academy distinguishes itself as a free, comprehensive, community-driven platform designed to educate and engage the next generation of web3 users and contributors.
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer:
- Develop AI integration for the dApp plus Telegram and Discord bots
- New lessons and quests supporting the public goods ecosystem 
- Develop audio and video content to reach new audiences in web3 and web2 platforms
- More in-person workshops at upcoming Ethereum events
- Integration with university and blockchain clubs in Europe, Africa and the Americas
- Research & development efforts with high focus on innovation and product upgrades during 2025
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]‚Äîfor example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Bankless Academy
project.description:
[Bankless Academy](https://app.banklessacademy.com/) **is an interactive, free-to-access, web3 education platform, providing the essential tools and knowledge needed to ‚Äúgo bankless‚Äù.** Through its multilingual onchain user journey, internet citizens develop ownership over their digital world üßëüèª‚ÄçüöÄ¬†üöÄ¬†

![image](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H1Wfdvp1kl.png)

Our platform takes a hands-on approach to Ethereum education, pairing theory with practice. We believe that to understand web3, *you must use it*. 

Our blend of interactive content, knowledge checks, and onchain quests make navigating the blockchain multiverse easy and engaging. 

![image (1)](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Sk27uDaJ1l.png)


We continue to pioneer #antisybil efforts as one of the [first education platforms to integrate Human Passport](https://www.gitcoin.co/blog/bankless-academy-a-gitcoin-passport-case-study) - preserving the legitimacy of real end-user education.

Currently, our learning journey covers [22 crucial topics](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons), including:

- [Ethereum Basics](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/ethereum-basics)
- [Bitcoin Basics](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/bitcoin-basics) ‚Äî in 7 languages
- [Wallet Basics](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/wallet-basics)
- [Web3 Security](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/web3-security)
- [Layer 2 Blockchains](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/layer-2-blockchains)
- [Managing Token Allowances](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/managing-token-allowances)
- [Staking on Ethereum](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/staking-on-ethereum)
- [Optimism Governance](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/optimism-governance) ‚Äî in 6 languages
- [Gitcoin 2.0 Essentials](https://app.banklessacademy.com/lessons/gitcoin-2.0-essentials)

![image (2)](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Bk-KOvTJJx.png)


With your support during this Gitcoin round, Bankless Academy can continue to provide free web3 education for all, digitally and IRL.

## GG23 Highlights

### Onchain Certifications

As of March 24th, 2025, a total of [23,607 onchain certifications have been minted](https://dune.com/didierkrux/bankless-academy-badges) and delivered to students.

![image (3)](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJin_wp1yl.png)


### Upgrades to the Explorer Profile

The upgraded Explorer Profile showcases your onchain actions through learning, knowledge-sharing, and support for public goods in the Ethereum ecosystem. Our goal is to reflect your positive impact in Web3 in a transparent, decentralized and immutable way thanks to blockchain technology.

Improvements include:

üßë‚ÄçüöÄ Building Your Onchain Resume
ü§ù Introducing Communities
üéì Referrals: Learner to Mentor
ü•á Achievements: Track Your Impact

Read our full [update here.](https://mirror.xyz/banklessacademy.eth/rN6HTN6oxLD6jK_02HaE406LhPsZYkVYo5q7ZhqaE3g)

![image (4)](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/r1VkFvTJJl.png)

### Bankless Academy Onboarding Booths

We‚Äôve provided an starting point for explorers attending diverse Ethereum events for the first time. Activations include onboarding booths at the [Regen Village](https://x.com/BanklessAcademy/status/1811455220943069397) during ETHCC Brussels, [NapulETH](https://x.com/BanklessAcademy/status/1834263102474383792), [ETH Milan](https://x.com/BanklessAcademy/status/1839275986799452523), and lastly during the [New to Web3? Start Here event in Bangkok, right before DevCon SEA 7](https://x.com/BanklessAcademy/status/1866709929245151489).

![image (5)](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/r1dYhw6JJl.png)
![image (6)](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HJuFhD61Jx.png)
![image (7)](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJOt2P6y1e.png)



### Blockchain Club Partnerships & Supporting Digital Communities

Texas Tech‚Äôs student blockchain club, the [Web3 Acceleration Association](https://x.com/ttu_waa/status/1830643013346881941), has officially integrated Bankless Academy as their educational partner, marking the second university club to utilize the dApp in their learning journey. In October, we will also conduct an online onboarding session for the [Hi Boat Explorers community in Nigeria](https://x.com/HIBOATXplorers/status/1842174009938526356). This session is part of a three-month program that will cover the complete Essentials and Level 1 curriculum of Bankless Academy through mentorship and asynchronous learning.

![Screenshot 2024-10-16 at 18.42.03 (1)](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyllCwTkkl.png)


## What's next for Bankless Academy?

- Develop AI integration for the dApp plus Telegram and Discord bots
- New lessons and quests supporting the public goods ecosystem 
- Develop audio and video content to reach new audiences in web3 and web2 platforms
- More in-person workshops at upcoming Ethereum events
- Integration with university and blockchain clubs in Europe, Africa and the Americas
- Research & development efforts with high focus on innovation and product upgrades during Q2

Your support enables Bankless Academy contributors to continue fulfilling the project‚Äôs mission through dedication and tangible real-world impact.

Stay connected with Bankless Academy, follow and reach out to us on:

- [X](https://twitter.com/BanklessAcademy)
- [Farcaster](https://warpcast.com/~/channel/banklessacademy)
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/bankless-academy/)
- [Lens](https://lenster.xyz/u/banklessacademy)
- [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/banklessacademy/)
- [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JMeVzmycj_s)
- [Sign up to the newsletter](https://bankless.ac/newsletter) 
- [Join the community on Telegram](https://bankless.ac/community) and learn how to **#OwnYourFuture** today! üöÄ

Thank you for your continued and unconditional support ü´°¬† 

‚Äî DidierKrux üßëüèª‚Äçüíª¬†& OrnellaWeb3 üéì
